name: react-redux-microblog
description: A blogging app built with React and Redux. Backend code in Express and Postgres provided by [Rithm School](https://www.rithmschool.com/). Pair programmed with [Hekmat Kudrat](https://github.com/hekmatkudrat).

scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
